Bubbly Tap Game

Minimalistic puzzle game

This is simple and relaxing game with minimalistic style. Over 100 levels, different bubbles behavior, two color themes. No pressure, no hurry, no time limits. Just tap on screen solving puzzles.

"Bubbly Tap" is in active develop, but in few weeks game will be released on several platforms:

Web, Android and iOS

Press Kit
